Description: This phishing email credential harvest script generates random email addresses and attachments that can be used to log in at a targeted website. The script was designed for automation and is configured to randomly generate email addresses, attachments, and credential password pairs.

Technical Requirements:
- The script requirements are system administrator privileges and ability to run scripts.
- A web browser must be available at all times for execution of the script.

Script Synopsis:
